text: Sprashivayut oni tebya o novoluniyakh. Skazhi: "Oni - opredeleniye vremeni dlya lyudey i dlya khadzha". Ne v tom blagochestiye, chtoby vkhodit' vam v doma s zadney storony, no blagochestiye - kto stal bogoboyaznennym. Vkhodite zhe v dom cherez dveri i boytes' Allakha, - mozhet byt', vy budete schastlivy
